About Vinoga

Vinoga is the most popular video game about wine on Facebook. Players spend hours learning about wine. They are now a very targeted audiance.

  • 60,000+ players
  • 50% of the player are women aged 30+
  • Players play in average 1 hour per day

Our Experienced Team

Founded in 2012 and supported by the business incubator of Telecom SudParis, Paris Pionnières and recognized experts, Metidia focuses on its very first video game about wine: Vinoga. With all its ambition, the team also prepares the scaling of the game to optimise players experience, as well as its internationalization and the diversification of this concept.
